about_the_game:
Repair, Paint, Sell - together!

"Junkyard Treasure Together" begins in a scrapyard, but the adventure doesn't end there! In this four-player co-op game, team up with your friends to take a beat-up junk car and turn it into a masterpiece. Your mission is simple: repair, paint, polish, and sell your way to profit!



Features:

  • Teamwork: Join forces with up to four players and combine your skills to form the ultimate repair crew.
  • Detailed Repair Mechanics: Strip down the engine, replace parts, fix the bodywork, and restore the car to its former glory.
  • Personalize Your Ride: Add your unique touch with a variety of paint and polish options.
  • Profit Strategy: Make a profit on each car you flip and upgrade your tools and equipment.
  • Race Against Time: Be quick and outbid your competitors to snag the best cars first!

Are you ready for a fun-filled repair adventure with your friends? What starts in the scrapyard could turn into pure gold with your creativity!
